summary: Three young people, two boys and a girl, meet on a Friday evening in an urban post-disaster setting which has brought Helsinki to ruins. The boys' sole purpose of life is to play a Flip-Flop pinball machine.
cast: Tiina Bergström|Asmo Hurula|Elina Kivihalme|Eero Manner|Jukka Mikkola|Antti Ortamo|Matti Pellonpää|Paavo Piskonen|Martti Syrjä|Anssi Tikanmäki|Kaj Troberg|Eero Tuomikoski|Lauri Törhönen
title: Jackpot 2
